description: Triangular array formed from even elements to right of middle of rows of the triangle of Eulerian numbers.
references: R. L. Graham, D. E. Knuth and O. Patashnik, Concrete Mathematics. Addison-Wesley, Reading, MA, 1990, p. 254.
author: _Mohammad K. Azarian_
extensions: Offset corrected by _Mohammad K. Azarian_, Nov 19 2008
